title: Cannot surfing Internet after the configuration  is completed
answer:
(1) Check whether the settings of, such as the Internet-access mode, method to obtain the IP address, and authentication parameters are correct. And check whether Apply and Save are clicked to apply and save the settings
(2) Enter the page of Status > WiMAX > WiMAX Statï¼Œcheck the signal strength and quality, then try to move the BM632 toward window to improve the strength and quality
(3) If WiMAX signal is weak, try to move CPE to a indoor open space, sometimes moving toward to window can get strong signal
